## HEALTH & SAFETY COMMITTEE (Rule 1040)

| Type | Workers | Meetings |
|------|---------|----------|
| Type A | 10-50 (hazardous) | Monthly |
| Type B | 51-200 | Monthly |
| Type C | 201-400 | Monthly |
| Type D | 401-1000 | Monthly |
| Type E | Over 1000 | Monthly |

**Key Points:**
- Required for 10+ workers in hazardous workplaces
- Composed of: employer rep, safety officer, workers' reps, company physician
- Monthly meetings required for all types
- Must keep minutes of meetings
- Workers' representatives elected by workers
